mapper.select: SELECT u.uSerialNumber, m.mClass, s.location, s.sName, e.userName, e.rank, u.uAmount, TO_CHAR(u.uDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS udate FROM Uses u INNER JOIN SubClass s ON u.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber INNER JOIN Employee e ON u.userid = e.userid INNER JOIN MainClass m ON s.mcSerialNumber = m.mcSerialNumber

SELECT u.uSerialNumber, m.mClass, s.location, s.sName, e.userName, e.rank, u.uAmount, TO_CHAR(u.uDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS udate FROM Uses u INNER JOIN SubClass s ON u.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber INNER JOIN Employee e ON u.userid = e.userid INNER JOIN MainClass m ON s.mcSerialNumber = m.mcSerialNumber WHERE TO_CHAR(uDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{uDate}

SELECT m.mClass, sum(u.uAmount) As uAmount FROM Uses u INNER JOIN SubClass s ON u.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber INNER JOIN MainClass m ON s.mcSerialNumber = m.mcSerialNumber WHERE TO_CHAR(uDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{uDate} GROUP BY m.mClass
SELECT userid, sum(uAmount) AS uAmount FROM Uses WHERE TO_CHAR(uDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{uDate} GROUP BY userid

SELECT m.mClass, s.location, s.sName, sum(u.uAmount) As uAmount FROM Uses u INNER JOIN SubClass s ON u.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber INNER JOIN MainClass m ON s.mcSerialNumber = m.mcSerialNumber WHERE TO_CHAR(uDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{uDate} GROUP BY m.mClass,s.location,s.sName
